ai-patthana13.10:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.10:1.1_0: for the sake of increaseing the teaching ...
ai-patthana13.10:1.1_1: for the sake of increaseing the teaching ...
ai-patthana13.10:1.1_2: for the sake of increaseing the teaching ...
ai-patthana13.10:1.1_3: thoughts that go towards increase, and don’t go to accumulation; because of this or that way they’re a cause of reason.
ai-patthana13.10:2.1_1: for the sake of decrease, not outcome, there is the cause,
ai-patthana13.10:2.1_3: go towards increase, delighting in settles, and leads to discrimination.
ai-patthana13.10:3.1_1: ‘This principle of those who go towards increase.
ai-patthana13.10:4.1_0: Gaining, go towards increase, and (intentional) things, there is no cause or condition for the settlement.
ai-patthana13.10:4.1_2: and things that go towards increase.
ai-patthana13.10:5.1_2: go towards increase, and don’t go towards decrease,
ai-patthana13.10:5.1_3: This is the section in brief.
